creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: Covered ceramic ting. Chinese, Han Dynasty; covered round vessel with three legs, two flare rectangular     handles; grey clay with faint red, black floral painting on cover. Modern Japanese characters on both parts; remiains of white slip around body; geometric band. Dia.8-3/5 x H.7-5/8 in. Firing cracks where legs attached to the body; good; fragile
title: Covered Ting
